comments.projectStartDate: The date when daily automation starts
comments.stages: Article generation phases with different daily targets
comments.topics: List of core topics for content generation
comments.totalMinThreshold: Trigger replenishment when total topics across all files < this number
comments.targetReplenishAmount: Target number of NEW valid topics to add during replenishment
comments.topicsPerReplenish: Number of topics to randomly select for each replenishment cycle
